noun.description: A person who believes that the spirits of the dead can communicate with living people.
examples: he became an ardent spiritualist, attending seances and insisting on their authenticity

noun.description: An advocate of the doctrine that the spirit exists as distinct from matter, or that spirit is the only reality.

adjective.description: Relating to the belief that the spirits of the dead can communicate with living people.
examples: spiritualist mediums who claim to be able to contact the dead
an active member of the spiritualist movement
